pkgmetadata.longdescription: # CaraML Google AuthenticationUtility package containing functions to authenticate users of the Python SDKs of CaraML.## InstallationTo install via `pip`:```shellpip install caraml-auth-google```To specify this in a `requirements.txt` file:```txt# Other dependencies herecaraml-auth-google```## Unit TestsTo run the unit tests, run the following command:```shellmake test```
